question: In 1976, which gymnast scored 7 maximum scores of 10 as she won three gold medals, one silver and one bronze?
api_result: In 1976, the gymnast who scored 7 maximum scores of 10 and won three gold medals, one silver, and one bronze at the Montreal Olympics was Nadia Comăneci. She made history by achieving the first perfect 10 in Olympic gymnastics.
